Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Steam (ST): "...Oh, you mean the Golden Witch, {f:5:Beatrice}. The one whose gold was supposedly necessary for the revived Ushiromiya family we see today. ...Quite a fantastical story, just what one might expect from Father."
Umineko Project (UP): "......The Golden Witch, {f:5:Beatrice}, was it? Something like—the revival of the Ushiromiya family to what it is today would never have been possible without the gold she gave... ......A fantastical story, very much like Father."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......The Golden Witch, Beatrice, was it? Without the gold she gave, the revival of the Ushiromiya family to what it is today would not have succeeded, or something. ......Just like Father, a fantastical story."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……黄金の魔女、ベアトリーチェ、ですか。今日の右代宮家の復興は、彼女が授けた黄金がなければ成し遂げられなかったとか。……お父様らしい、幻想的なお話ですね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……黄金の魔女、ベアトリーチェ、ですか。今日の右代宮家の復興は、彼女が授けた黄金がなければ成し遂げられなかったとか。……お父様らしい、幻想的なお話ですね」
Russian (RU): "......Золотой Ведьмы, {f:5:Беатриче}, не так ли? Без оставленного ею золота, возрождения семьи Уширомия до сегодняшнего состояния могло бы и не быть. ......Вполне в духе отца, загадочная история."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Fala da Bruxa Dourada, {f:5:Beatrice}? Algo como — o renascimento da família Ushiromiya ao que é hoje nunca teria sido possível sem o ouro que ela deu... ......É mesmo uma história fantasiosa, exatamente o que se espera do pai."
Vietnamese (VI): "......The Golden Witch, {f:5:Beatrice}, was it? Something like—the revival of the Ushiromiya family to what it is today would never have been possible without the gold she gave... ......A fantastical story, very much like Father."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……黃金的魔女，貝阿朵莉切麼。都說什麼右代宮家今日的復興，若沒有她所授予的黃金就沒法達成什麼的。……真是個挺有爸風格的，充滿幻想的故事呢。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……黄金的魔女，贝阿朵莉切么。都说什么右代宫家今日的复兴，若没有她所授予的黄金就没法达成什么的。……真是个挺有爸风格的，充满幻想的故事呢。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......The Golden Witch, {f:5:Beatrice}, was it? Something like—the revival of the Ushiromiya family to what it is today would never have been possible without the gold she gave... ......A fantastical story, very much like Father."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... La Strega Dorata, Beatrice, eh? Senza l'oro che lei ha donato, la rinascita della famiglia Ushiromiya in quello che è oggi non sarebbe potuta accadere, o qualcosa di simile. ... Proprio da Papà, una storia fantastica."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "...La Strega Dorata {f:5:Beatrice}? Si dice che senza l'oro da lei donato, la rinascita della famiglia Ushiromiya in quella che è oggi non sarebbe potuta avvenire... Una storia creativa, tipica di nostro padre."
Turkish (TR): "......Altın Cadı {f:5:Beatrice}, değil mi? Ushiromiya ailesinin bugün sahip olduğu konuma gelmesi, onun sağladığı altınlar olmadan asla mümkün olamazdı—gibi bir şey... ......Babama fazlasıyla uyan fantastik bir hikaye."

Steam (ST): Natsuhi spoke in a perfectly ordinary way. It was the sort of comment you'd expect from someone convinced that the thought of a witch existing was ridiculous, no more than another of Kinzo's ramblings.
Umineko Project (UP): Natsuhi spoke of her in her usual way.{n}...She spoke from the position that the idea of a witch was just foolish, and that in the end, it was nothing more than Kinzo's ramblings.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Natsuhi spoke in a perfectly ordinary way....She spoke from the position that the idea of a witch was just foolish, and that after all, it was nothing more than Kinzo's ramblings.
PC Japanese (JP): 夏妃のその言い方は、普段通り。…魔女なんて馬鹿らしい、所詮は金蔵の世迷言に過ぎないという立場での言い分だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 夏妃のその言い方は、普段通り。{n}…魔女なんて馬鹿らしい、所詮は金蔵の世迷言に過ぎないという立場での言い分だ。
Russian (RU): Нацухи говорила совершенно повседневным голосом.{n}...Она говорила с той позиции, что вера в ведьм просто нелепа, и в итоге, это не более чем болтовня Кинзо.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Natsuhi falou dela de sua forma usual.{n}...Era o tipo de comentário esperado de alguém convencido que a existência de uma bruxa era algo tolo, nada mais do que um dos delírios de Kinzo.
Vietnamese (VI): Natsuhi spoke of her in her usual way.{n}...She spoke from the position that the idea of a witch was just foolish, and that in the end, it was nothing more than Kinzo's ramblings.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 夏妃的語氣和平常一樣。{n}…是站在認為魔女什麼的荒唐透頂，這些只不過是金藏胡言亂語的立場上說的話。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 夏妃的语气和平常一样。{n}…是站在认为魔女什么的荒唐透顶，这些只不过是金藏胡言乱语的立场上说的话。
Indonesian (IDN): Natsuhi spoke of her in her usual way.{n}...She spoke from the position that the idea of a witch was just foolish, and that in the end, it was nothing more than Kinzo's ramblings.
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Natsuhi parlava in maniera del tutto ordinaria. ... Parlava dal punto di vista che l'idea di una strega sia semplicemente sciocca, e che dopotutto, non si trattava d'altro che degli sproloqui di Kinzo.
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Natsuhi parlava in maniera del tutto normale...{n}Parlava da un punto di vista per cui cose come le streghe erano delle sciocchezze, niente di più che il frutto degli sproloqui di Kinzo...
Turkish (TR): Natsuhi ondan her zamanki gibi bahsetti.{n}...Bir cadı fikrinin aptalca olduğunu ve sonuçta Kinzo'nun saçmalıklarından başka bir şey olmadığını söyledi.

Steam (ST): So, Natsuhi's words made it feel as though someone was trying to deny the existence of that person, or else make it seem like she was never there to begin with...
Umineko Project (UP): So Natsuhi's choice of words seemed almost like a refusal to accept her existence, or as if she was leading her to think that she did not exist...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So Natsuhi's method of speech seemed almost like it was inducing her to not accept that the witch existed, or that it was forcing her to think that it might not exist...
PC Japanese (JP): だからこそ夏妃の言い方がまるで、その存在を認めない、あるいは、いないかのように思い込ませる誘導のように感じてしまう…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): だからこそ夏妃の言い方がまるで、その存在を認めない、あるいは、いないかのように思い込ませる誘導のように感じてしまう…。
Russian (RU): Поэтому казалось, будто речь Нацухи принуждала её не принимать существование ведьм или заставляла думать, что они не могут существовать...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Por isso, as palavra de Natsuhi passaram a impressão de que ela estava negando a existência daquela pessoa, ou talvez fazendo parecer que ela nunca tivesse existido...
Vietnamese (VI): So Natsuhi's choice of words seemed almost like a refusal to accept her existence, or as if she was leading her to think that she did not exist...

Chinese Simplified (CN): 所以她感觉夏妃的这种说法，简直就像是不承认那个存在，又或者说是，想诱导自己去认为，本就没有那个存在似的…。
Indonesian (IDN): So Natsuhi's choice of words seemed almost like a refusal to accept her existence, or as if she was leading her to think that she did not exist...
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi sembrava quasi che il discorso di Natsuhi volesse indurla a non accettare che la strega esistesse, oppure che la stesse portando a pensare che non potesse esistere...
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): Per questo la frase di Natsuhi le sembrava indurla a non accettare la sua esistenza, o a convincerla che non fosse lì...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Kinzo e eu já não somos nada mais do que peças colocadas no tabuleiro. ...Tudo que resta agora é esperar o resultado da roleta para ver quem vencerá e quem perderá. .........Até a roleta mostrar seu resultado, não há necessidade para eu e Kinzo nos reunirmos."
Vietnamese (VI): "......Already, Kinzo and even I are nothing more than pieces laid out on the game board. ...All that is left is for the result of the roulette to decide who wins and who loses. .........Until the roulette shows its result, there is no need for me to be reunited with Kinzo."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……就連金藏，還有妾身，都已不過是擺在棋盤上的棋子。…接下來就只用等輪盤賭的結果來分出勝負了。………在輪盤賭示出結果之前，妾身沒有與金藏再會的必要。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……就连金藏，还有妾身，都已不过是摆在棋盘上的棋子。…接下来就只用等轮盘赌的结果来分出胜负了。………在轮盘赌示出结果之前，妾身没有与金藏再会的必要。」
Indonesian (IDN): "......Already, Kinzo and even I are nothing more than pieces laid out on the game board. ...All that is left is for the result of the roulette to decide who wins and who loses. .........Until the roulette shows its result, there is no need for me to be reunited with Kinzo."
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... A questo punto, Kinzo e persino io non siamo altro che pezzi posizionati sulla scacchiera. ... Tutto ciò che resta è aspettare che la roulette decida chi vince e chi perde. ... Fino a che la roulette non mostrerà il suo verdetto, non c'è bisogno che io raggiunga Kinzo."
Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Ormai, sia Kinzo che io non siamo altro che pedine posizionate sulla scacchiera... Tutto ciò che rimane è che il risultato della roulette decida l'esito. Finché la roulette non lo mostrerà, non c'è bisogno che io e Kinzo ci rivediamo."
Turkish (TR): "......Zaten Kinzo ve ben bile oyun tahtasına yerleştirilmiş taşlardan başka bir şey değiliz. ...Geriye kalan tek şey ruletin sonuçlarının kimin kazanıp kimin kaybedeceğine karar vermesi. .........Rulet sonuçlanana kadar Kinzo ile yeniden bir araya gelmeme gerek yok."

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "I like it, Kinzo. Allow me to enjoy my game with you. ...Allow me to enjoy the failure of the final gamble...of the old magician who fell in love with me and threw away his entire life...!!"

PC Japanese (JP): 「気に入ったぞ、金蔵。そなたとのゲーム、楽しませてもらうぞ。……妾に恋焦がれ全ての生涯を投げ出した老魔術師の最後のギャンブル、その散り様を楽しませてもらうぞ…！！」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu gosto disso, Kinzo. Permita‐me aproveitar o meu jogo com você. ......Permita‐me aproveitar a aposta final e queda de um mago envelhecido, que se apaixonou por mim e jogou fora toda a sua vida...!!"
Vietnamese (VI): "I like it, Kinzo. Allow me to enjoy my game with you. ......Allow me to enjoy the final gamble and fall of an aged mage, who fell in love with me and threw away all his life...!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「正合妾身之意啊，金藏。就讓妾身好好享受一盤和汝的對局吧。……讓妾身好好欣賞一下，為思戀妾身而心焦到豁出自己整個人生的老魔術師，這最後一場賭博，會是怎麼個敗法…！！」

Italian (Majotachi no Sub) (New) (IT): "Una bella idea, Kinzo. Rendimi godibile questa tua partita...{n}Concedimi di intrattenermi con l'ultima scommessa di un vecchio stregone che ha sprecato tutta la sua vita a struggersi per me, che si concluderà con il suo crollo...!!"
